dmca.title: Designed Nutritional Claims Unhealthy Infringement
dmca.body:
Re:	Copyright Infringement To Whom It May Concern:

The pages of the alleged infringements are designed so as not to be indexed with the search engines, though the Website in general is indexed all over. Under these circumstances, am I wasting my time in filing this complaint?

Sincerely, [Private]
<hr>
Designed, Nutritional
May 17, 2005


Google Inc.
Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints 
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

To Whom It May Concern:

Thank you for your rapid response and instruction. Below is the information you requested. Our website is dynamic and frequently updated. However, the information contained on our website remains the property of Designed Nutritional Products even if it becomes obsolete.

This link contains text and our trademark reproduced from a PDF on our website. Alleged Infringement: http://www.karlloren.com/ogc/claims/c3.htm

Designed Nutritional Copyrighted Source:
http://www.designednutritional.com/Info%20sheets/GermaniumSesq.html
This link shows a reproduction of our old website entrance page and a replication of a product information sheet.
Alleged Infringement: http://www.karlloren.com/ogc/competition/p1.htm

Designed Nutritional Copyrighted Source: http://www.designednutritional.com/NewFiles/index.html http://www.desigmdnutritional.com/Products.html
http://www. designednutritional.com/Info%20sheets/GermaniumSesq.html

This link contains over fifty pages of material located at the same address, and the most egregious infringements. Approximately twelve pages of content are copied directly from our website but they are published interlaced with other content copied from other websites. In order to facilitate your verification of the infringements, the sources on Designed Nutritional's website are listed in the order they appear on the infringing website.

Alleged Infringement: http://www.organicgermanium.net/competition/comp1.htm
 Designed Nutritional Copyrighted Sources:

http://www.designednutritional.com/Header%20Side%20Door/US%20Organic%20Germanium.html
http://www.designednutritional.com/Products.html 
http://www.designednutritional.com/Info%20sheets/GermaniumSesq.html http://www.designednutritional.com.Header%2OSide%2ODoor/SoLite%20Flyer2.html

http://www.designednutritional.com/Header%20Side%20Door/Answers%20SoLite%20Safety.html

http://wwvv.designednutritional.com/Header%2OSide%20Door/Answers%20SoLite%20Drug%2OScreen.html

http: //www.designednutritional.com /Header%20Side%20Door/Answers %20Solite%20Conditions.html
http://www.designednutritional.com/Header%20Side%20Door/Answers%20SoLite%20Fast%20Action.html
http://www.designednutritional.com/Header%20Side%20Door/Answers%20SoLite%20sideffects.html

http://www.designednutritional.com/Header%20Side%20Door/Answers%20SoLite%20extract.html
http://www. designednutritional.com/Header%20Side%20Door/SoLite%20AnteriorCingu late.html
http://www.designednutritional.com/Header%2OSide%2ODoor/SoLite%2OBasalGanglia.html
http://www.designednutritional.com/Header%20Side%20Door/SoLite%20ThalamusLimbic.html

Designed Nutritional Products is pursuing this matter in good faith, believing that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing WebPages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. The owner of the alleged infringing Website can be reached by mail at Vibrant Life, [private], Burbank, CA 91504, by calling either [private] or [private]. The Fax number is [private]. Email: [private]@oralchelation.com

T swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

[Private] President / CEO

Designed Nutritional Products
[private]
Orem, UT 84058
Ph: [private]
Fax: [private]
Email: [private]@designednutritional.com Web : www.designednutritional.com
